headline: Bioadhesives Market Set to Hit USD 14.60 Billion by 2029
summary: The bioadhesives market is projected to grow to USD 14.60 billion by 2029, increasing at a CAGR of 8.6% from USD 9.65 billion in 2024. This growth is driven by rising demand for eco-friendly adhesives in industries such as construction, woodworking, and medical applications. Europe is set to lead, with Germany experiencing the fastest growth due to its robust infrastructure and focus on sustainability. Asia Pacific follows, with strong demand in paper & packaging and medical sectors. Key players
